UMCS.Games
Class RandomIntGame

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--UMCS.Games.RandomIntGame
public class RandomIntGame
extends java.lang.Object
implements Game

RANDOM GAME WITH INTEGER VALUES Implements an incremental random game tree (for OmSearch and PromSearch). Gives evaluations simultaneously for a set of opponents. The Branchingfactor is selected randomly per child between minwidth and maxwidth (inclusive). Parent node base[0] is used as random seed for children. Games played with the same start move will be identical, independent of the used search algorithm.

Version:
May 2000
Author:
Jeroen Donkers
